channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260116.1)
item.description:
What's New

fix: Support enabling built-in rules that are disabled by default

Add enabledBuiltInRules setting to complement disabledBuiltInRules.

Problem:

  • Rules like 'Firefox Address Bar (AX Direct)' have isEnabled=false by default
  • User could toggle them in UI but they would never be applied
  • The matching logic only checked disabledBuiltInRules, ignoring the rule's

default isEnabled state

Solution:

  • Add enabledBuiltInRules key to SharedSettings for rules disabled by default
  • Update rule matching logic to check both lists based on default state:

- rule.isEnabled=true: check if NOT in disabledBuiltInRules

- rule.isEnabled=false: check if IN enabledBuiltInRules

  • Update getBuiltInRules(), toggleBuiltInRule(), isBuiltInRuleEnabled()

to properly handle both scenarios

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
